title: mcbbs怎么改名
author: lllbbbwww
txt_content:
大佬们知道咋改名吗
名字瞎输的，想改个名，好像还得要什么绿宝石，绿宝石又咋得啊

replies.author: 阿灬秋
replies.txt_content: 你需要先到六级获得绿宝石

replies.author: lllbbbwww
replies.txt_content:
阿秋Minecraft 发表于 2020-5-19 14:19
你需要先到六级获得绿宝石
六六六六级？？？

replies.author: ChrisP
replies.txt_content: 再搞个小号

replies.author: JYand
replies.txt_content: 道具商店页面有改名卡

replies.author: 阿灬秋
replies.txt_content:
lllbbbwww 发表于 2020-5-19 14:22
六六六六级？？？
没错 慢慢水吧

replies.author: 最亮的信标
replies.txt_content: 最简单的办法就是上6级，领3颗绿宝石，改名卡绿宝石 1 颗/张。或者是有别的版奖励绿宝石，比如翻译版

replies.author: lh6666
replies.txt_content: 等你到6级给你3个

replies.author: 北极仙光
replies.txt_content: 六级领绿宝石红包

replies.author: qxfrr
replies.txt_content: 6级领三个绿宝石，然后买命名牌

replies.author: lllbbbwww
replies.txt_content:
ChrisP 发表于 2020-5-19 14:22
再搞个小号
绝了

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content: 先升级吧，到六级

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content: 六级得到绿宝石

replies.author: 心酸凋灵
replies.txt_content: 你叫卢本伟？

replies.author: 岩伍
replies.txt_content: 自带bgm的id“得得得得得得得得得得得得”

replies.author: lllbbbwww
replies.txt_content:
心酸凋灵 发表于 2020-5-19 14:27
你叫卢本伟？
没想那么多瞎输的

replies.author: 心酸凋灵
replies.txt_content:
lllbbbwww 发表于 2020-5-19 14:29
没想那么多瞎输的
额，瞎输就想到卢本伟了？

replies.author: huanhuan233
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，改名的话要用绿宝石的

replies.author: 魅-内存君
replies.txt_content:
你需要先到六级。
然后淦一颗绿宝石。

replies.author: Ghostmeow
replies.txt_content: 6级之后用绿宝石

replies.author: aa27460
replies.txt_content: 六级才能得绿宝石 一起水吧

replies.author: Regrets.
replies.txt_content: 右上角道具 有改名卡购买 1颗绿宝石

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 绿宝石买

replies.author: lllbbbwww
replies.txt_content:
心酸凋灵 发表于 2020-5-19 14:30
额，瞎输就想到卢本伟了？

replies.author: flask30k
replies.txt_content: 我也想改名字
